p.rus: Начните с базовым HTML шаблоном, или измените эти примеры. Мы надеемся, что вы настроите наши шаблоны и примеры, адаптируя их для своих нужд.
p.eng: Start with this basic HTML template, or modify these examples. We hope you'll customize our templates and examples, adapting them to suit your needs.

p.rus: Ниже приведен HTML-код, который использует минимизированную версию Bootstrap-документа.
p.eng: Copy the HTML below to begin working with a minimal Bootstrap document.

comment.rus: <!-- HTML5 Shim and Respond.js for IE8 support of HTML5 elements and media queries -->
comment.eng: <!-- HTML5 shim and Respond.js for IE8 support of HTML5 elements and media queries -->

comment.rus: <!-- WARNING: Respond.js doesn't work if you view the page via file:// -->
comment.eng: <!-- WARNING: Respond.js doesn't work if you view the page via file:// -->

comment.rus: <!-- Include all compiled plugins (below), or include individual files as needed -->
comment.eng: <!-- Include all compiled plugins (below), or include individual files as needed -->
